name: Fishy Signals
description:
Controls: Spacebar

You lost your lover to a fishing boat and now it's time for revenge! 

Morse Code terms 

  • TL : "I'm on fire"
  • W:  "I require medical assistance"
  • 8 : "Hugs and kisses"
based on international signal terms used at sea

Created for the 1-button game jam 2018.

Music by alphatone https://freesound.org/people/alphatone/sounds/385876/
Background generated from https://trianglify.io/

Team:
Design, Code @jvergara
Design, Art, Additional Code @haiyoooo
